newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Gulf rigs under contract up 5 at 168.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Gulf rigs under contract up 5 at 168.

text.p: There were 168 rigs under contract in the U.S. Gulf as of February 7, up five from the period ending January 31, Offshore Data Services said Friday.
The utilization rate for rigs working in the Gulf, based on a total fleet of 184, was 91.3 percent.
The number of working rigs in the European/Mediterranean area remained unchanged at 105 rigs under contract out of a total fleet of 106, a utilization rate of 99.1 pct.
The worldwide rig count rose four to 567 out of a total fleet of 606, making the utilization rate 93.6 percent.
